job_description:
Company: MobilePro
Position: Mobile Developer
Location: Los Angeles, CA (Remote)
Salary: $110,000 - $140,000

About Us:
MobilePro is a mobile app development company. We build high-quality apps for iOS and Android. We are passionate about mobile technology and creating great user experiences.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Mobile Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining our mobile apps. The ideal candidate will have experience with Swift or Kotlin.

Responsibilities:
- Develop new features for our mobile apps
- Write unit tests
- Debug and fix bugs
- Collaborate with designers and product managers

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 2+ years of experience in mobile development
- Experience with Swift or Kotlin
- Knowledge of mobile UI/UX best practices

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with React Native or Flutter
- Experience with RESTful APIs

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Flexible work arrangements
- Opportunity to work on a variety of projects
